name: Game Of Puzzles: Nature
description:
Game Of Puzzles: Nature - is a puzzle game in which you have to assemble a single image from individual pieces.
You need to collect from the small pictures one big and after you may to going at the new level.
Features:
  • 20 levels (the amount will increase)
  • A range of sizes from 9 to 25 pieces
  • Perfect for ages 3+
  • Auto Saving
  • Simple mouse control
  • Traditional puzzle gameplay
  • Steam Achievements
Credits: This game was created using Clickteam Fusion 2.5! Music by Erwarda Savitnaag.
